name: Monkey Maze
description:
Play as a monkey navigating a dungeon  to escape your insane father and save your brother in the process! &%%#H((*&E)(&*L&%$&P$$#@M&&%^E@@#!

How to play: Download the file, Go to your web browser, Search for Makecode.org (or click the Link), Click arcade, go to import, Select the file, play!  P.S try for the lowest score!
